 31631                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31632                                  	;
 31633                                  	;push	ds
 31634                                  	;push	cs
 31635                                  	;pop	ds
 31636                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31637                                  	;pop	ds	
 31638                                  
 31639                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31640                                  
 31641                                  	or	al,al
 31642                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31643                                  
 31644                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31645                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31646                                  	retn			; that.
 31647                                  uhu10:	
 31648                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31649                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31650                                  
 31651                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31652                                  	;
 31653                                  	;push	es
 31654                                  	;push	cs
 31655                                  	;pop	es
 31656                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31657                                  	;pop	ds	
 31658                                  
 31659                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31660                                  
 31661                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31662                                  
 31663                                  	pop	ax
 31664                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31665                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31666                                  	retn
 31667                                  
 31668                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31669                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31670                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31671                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31672                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31673                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31674                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31675                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31676                                  
 31677                                  he_unlink:
 31678                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31679                                  
 31680                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31681                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31682                                  
 31683                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31684                                  	int	21h
 31685                                  	retn
 31686                                  
 31687                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31688                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31689                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31690                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31691                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31692                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31693                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31694                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31695                                  
 31696                                  FreeUMBs:
 31697                                  	push	ax
 31698                                  	push	es
 31699                                  
 31700                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31701                                  	jc	short fusX
 31702                                  
 31703                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31704                                  fus10:	
 31705                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31706                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31707                                  	call	freeMCB
 31708                                  fus20:	   
 31709                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31710                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31711                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31712                                  
 31713                                  	mov	ax,es
 31714                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31715                                  	inc	ax
 31716                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31717                                  
 31718                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31719                                  fusX:	
 31720                                  	pop	es
 31721                                  	pop	ax
 31722                                  	retn
 31723                                  
 31724                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31725                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31726                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31727                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31728                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31729                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31730                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31731                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31732                                  
 31733                                  isHideMCB:
 31734                                  	;push	ax
 31735                                  
 31736                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31737                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31738                                  
 31739                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31740                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31741                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31742                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31743                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31744                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31745                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31746                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31747                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31748                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31749                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31750                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31751                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31752                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31753                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31754                                  ihm_x:	
 31755                                  	;pop	ax
 31756                                  	retn
 31757                                  
 31758                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31759                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31760                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31761                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31762                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31763                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31764                                  ; USES:     AX
 31765                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31766                                  
 31767                                  freeMCB:
 31768                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31769                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31770                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31771                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31772                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31773                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31774                                  	retn
 31775                                  
 31776                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31777                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31778                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31779                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31780                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31781                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31782                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31783                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31784                                  
 31785                                  HeadUmb:
 31786                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31787                                  
 31788                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31789                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31790                                  	;push	es
 31791                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31792                                  
 31793                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31794                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31795                                  
 31796                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31797                                  	int	21h
 31798                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31799                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31800                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31801                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31802                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31803                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31804                                  
 31805                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31806                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31807                                  xhu_e:	
 31808                                  	;stc
 31809                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31810                                  xhu_x:	
 31811                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31812                                  	;pop	es	
 31813                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31814                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31815                                  	retn
 31816                                  
 31817                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31818                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31819                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31820                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31821                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31822                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31823                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31824                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31825                                  
 31826                                  linkumb:
 31827                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31828                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31829                                  
 31830                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31831                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31832                                  
 31833                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31834                                  	mov	bx,1
 31835                                  	int	21h
 31836                                  lumbX:
 31837                                  	retn
 31838                                  
 31839                                  %endif
 31840                                  
 31841                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31842                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 31843                                  
 31844                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31845                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31846                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31847                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31848                                  
 31849                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31850                                  ;
 31851                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31852                                  ;
 31853                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31854                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31855                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31856                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31857                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31858                                  ;
 31859                                  ;	Output : none
 31860                                  ;
 31861                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31862                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31863                                  ;
 31864                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31865                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31866                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31867                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31868                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31869                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31870                                  
 31871                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31872                                  InitDevLoad:
 31873                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31874                                  	; ds = cs
 31875 00002767 803E[731E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31876                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31877                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31878 0000276C 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31879                                  
 31880                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31881                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31882                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31883                                  ;
 31884                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31885                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31886                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31887                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31888                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31889                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31890                                  ;
 31891                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31892                                  ;
 31893                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31894                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31895                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31896                                  ;	pushf
 31897                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31898                                  ;	popf
 31899                                  ;
 31900                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31901                                  ;
 31902                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31903                                  
 31904                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31905                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31906                                  InitForConv:
 31907                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31908                                  	; ds = cs
 31909 0000276E E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31910                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31911 00002771 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31912 00002773 E83D04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31913 00002776 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31914 00002779 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31915                                  					;  in low memory
 31916                                  InitForHi:
 31917                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31918                                  	; ds = cs
 31919                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31920                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31921                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31922 0000277B A1[691E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31923 0000277E 8B16[651E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31924 00002782 0316[671E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31925 00002786 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31926                                  
 31927                                  InitForLo:
 31928                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31929                                  	; ds = cs
 31930                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31931 00002788 C606[731E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31932                                  initforlo_x:
 31933                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31934                                  	; ds = cs
 31935                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31936                                  					;  we are loading low
 31937                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31938                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31939 0000278D A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31940 00002790 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31941                                  idl1:
 31942 00002794 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31943                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31944                                  	; ds = cs
 31945                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31946                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31947                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31948                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31949 00002797 A3[581E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31950 0000279A 8916[5A1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31951 0000279E C706[5C1E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31952 000027A4 A3[5E1E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31953 000027A7 C3                      	retn
 31954                                  
 31955                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31956                                  ;
 31957                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31958                                  ;
 31959                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31960                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31961                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31962                                  ;		   current UMB
 31963                                  ;
 31964                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31965                                  
 31966                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31967                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31968                                  	; ds = cs
 31969                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31970                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31971                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31972 000027A8 A1[671E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31973 000027AB 0306[651E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31974 000027AF 2B06[691E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31975                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31976                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31977                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31978                                  	;stc
 31979                                  	;retn
 31980                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31981 000027B3 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31982 000027B6 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31983                                  spcinumb1:
 31984 000027B8 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31985                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31986                                  	; ds = cs
 31987 000027B9 3B06[561E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31988                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31989                                  spcinumb2:
 31990 000027BD C3                      	retn
 31991                                  
 31992                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31993                                  ;
 31994                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31995                                  ;
 31996                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31997                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31998                                  ;
 31999                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32000                                  
 32001                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32002                                  ;
 32003                                  ;PrepareMark:
 32004                                  ;	push	ds
 32005                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 32006                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32007                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32008                                  ;	pop	ds
 32009                                  ;
 32010                                  ;	inc	ax
 32011                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32012                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32013                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32014                                  ;	retn
 32015                                  
 32016                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32017                                  ;
 32018                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32019                                  ;
 32020                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32021                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32022                                  ;		 the device.
 32023                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32024                                  ;
 32025                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32026                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32027                                  ;	UMB.
 32028                                  ;
 32029                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32030                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32031                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32032                                  ;
 32033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32034                                  
 32035                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32036                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 32037                                  
 32038                                  GetUMBForDev:
 32039                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32040                                  	; ds = cs
 32041 000027BE BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 32042 000027C1 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32043 000027C4 CD21                    	int	21h
 32044                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 32045                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 32046                                  
 32047 000027C6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32048                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 32049                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32050 000027C8 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 32051                                  
 32052 000027CA 4B                      	dec	bx
 32053                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32054                                  	; ds = cs
 32055 000027CB 391E[561E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 32056                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 32057 000027CF 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 32058                                  
 32059 000027D1 43                      	inc	bx
 32060                                  
 32061 000027D2 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32062 000027D5 CD21                    	int	21h
 32063 000027D7 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 32064                                  
 32065                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32066                                  	;dec	ax
 32067                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 32068                                  	;
 32069                                  PrepareMark:
 32070 000027D9 1E                      	push	ds
 32071 000027DA 48                      	dec	ax
 32072 000027DB 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32073 000027DD C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32074 000027E3 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32075 000027E9 40                      	inc	ax
 32076 000027EA 1F                      	pop	ds
 32077                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32078                                  	; ds = cs
 32079                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32080                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32081                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32082                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 32083 000027EB 891E[671E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 32084 000027EF A3[651E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32085 000027F2 A3[691E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32086                                  	;
 32087                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32088                                  	; cf=0
 32089                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 32090 000027F5 C3                      	retn
 32091                                  
 32092                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32093                                  %if 1
 32094                                  gufd_err:
 32095 000027F6 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 32096                                  gufd_error:
 32097 000027F8 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32098 000027FA F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 32099 000027FB EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 32100                                  %endif
 32101                                  
 32102                                  ; 09/09/2023
 32103                                  %if 0
 32104                                  gufd_err:
 32105                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32106                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32107                                  	; ds = cs
 32108                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 32109                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32110                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32111                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 32112                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32113                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32114                                  	stc
 32115                                  	retn
 32116                                  %endif
 32117                                  
 32118                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32119                                  ;
 32120                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32121                                  ;
 32122                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32123                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32124                                  ;
 32125                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32126                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32127                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32128                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32129                                  ;
 32130                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32131                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32132                                  ;
 32133                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32134                                  
 32135                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32136                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32137                                  
 32138                                  DevSetMark:
 32139 000027FD 06                      	push	es
 32140 000027FE 57                      	push	di
 32141 000027FF 1E                      	push	ds
 32142 00002800 56                      	push	si
 32143 00002801 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32144 00002803 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32145 00002809 40                      	inc	ax
 32146 0000280A 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32147                                  
 32148                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32149                                  
 32150 0000280E 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 32151                                  
 32152                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32153                                  	; ds = cs
 32154                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32155 0000280F C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32156                                  
 32157 00002813 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32158 00002815 FC                      	cld
 32159                                  dsm_again:
 32160 00002816 AC                      	lodsb
 32161 00002817 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32162 00002819 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32163 0000281B 89F7                    	mov	di,si

 32199                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32200                                  ;
 32201                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32202                                  ;
 32203                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 32204                                  ;
 32205                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32206                                  ;	in DevSize
 32207                                  ;
 32208                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32209                                  
 32210                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32211                                  SizeDevice:
 32212                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32213                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 32226 00002860 CD21                    	int	21h

 32229 00002867 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32230 0000286A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32231 0000286E 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no

 32233                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32234 00002877 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32235                                  szdev1:

 32237 0000287B D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32238 0000287D B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32239 0000287F D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32240 00002881 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32241                                  	;
 32242                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)

 32254                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32255                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32256                                  	; cf=0
 32257                                  	;clc

 32260                                  					;  carry flag

 32628                                  ;
 32629                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32630                                  ;
 32631                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32632                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32633                                  ;
 32634                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32635                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32636                                  ;
 32637                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32638                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32639                                  ;
 32640                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32641                                  
 32642                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32643                                  
 32644                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32645                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32646                                  GetHexNum:
 32647 0000297F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32648 00002981 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32649                                  ghn_next:
 32650 00002983 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32651 00002986 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32652 00002989 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32653 0000298B 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32654 0000298E 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32655 00002990 50                      	push	ax
 32656 00002991 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32657 00002993 E82006                  	call	delim
 32658 00002996 58                      	pop	ax
 32659                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32660 00002997 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 32661 0000299A 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32662 0000299C E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32663                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32664                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32665 0000299F 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32666                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32667                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32668                                  ghn_shift1:
 32669 000029A1 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32670 000029A3 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32671 000029A5 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32672 000029A7 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32673 000029A9 46                      	inc	si
 32674 000029AA EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32675                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32676 000029AC 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32677 000029AF 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32678 000029B2 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32679 000029B6 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32680                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32681                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32682                                  ghn_shift2:
 32683 000029B8 F8                      	clc
 32684 000029B9 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32685 000029BB D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32686 000029BD E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32687 000029BF F8                      	clc

 32739                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 32740                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data

 32746                                  
 32747                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32748                                  ;
 32749                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32750                                  ;
 32751                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32752                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32753                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32754                                  ;			; DS = data
 32755                                  ;
 32756                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32757                                  ;
 32758                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32759                                  ;
 32760                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32761                                  
 32762                                  umb_insert:
 32763 000029DF 1E                      	push	ds
 32764                                  
 32765                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32766                                  	; ds = cs
 32767                                  
 32768                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32769 000029E0 8E1E[821E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32770                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32771 000029E4 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32772 000029E8 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32773 000029EA 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32774                                  ui_next:
 32775 000029EC 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32776                                  					;    new block
 32777 000029EE 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32778                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32779                                  					;    last
 32780 000029F0 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32781 000029F6 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32782                                  					; N: get next block
 32783 000029F8 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32784                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32785 000029FA E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32786 000029FD EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32787                                  
 32788                                  ui_insert:
 32789 000029FF 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32790 00002A01 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32791                                  
 32792 00002A02 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32793 00002A04 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32794                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32795 00002A06 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32796                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32797 00002A0B C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32798                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32799 00002A11 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32800                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32801 00002A15 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32802                                  
 32803                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32804                                  
 32805 00002A1B 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32806 00002A1D 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32807 00002A23 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32808                                  					; mark as free
 32809 00002A2A 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32810                                  					; start & end of new block
 32811 00002A2D 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32812                                  
 32813                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32814                                  	
 32815 00002A32 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32816 00002A34 43                      	inc	bx
 32817 00002A35 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32818 00002A37 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32819                                  
 32820                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32821                                  					; this block
 32822 00002A38 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32823                                  	
 32824 00002A3A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32825 00002A40 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32826 00002A47 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32827 00002A4B 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32828                                  
 32829 00002A52 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32830                                  
 32831                                  ui_append:
 32832                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32833 00002A54 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32834 00002A59 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32835                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32836                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32837                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32838 00002A5F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32839                                  
 32840 00002A65 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32841 00002A67 40                      	inc	ax
 32842 00002A68 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32843                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32844 00002A6A F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32845                                  
 32846 00002A6C 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32847                                  
 32848 00002A6E 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32849 00002A74 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32850 00002A7B 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32851 00002A7F 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32852                                  
 32853                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32854 00002A86 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32855 00002A88 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32856 00002A8E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32857                                  					; mark as free
 32858 00002A95 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32859 00002A96 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32860                                  ui_done:
 32861                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32862 00002A9B 1F                      	pop	ds
 32863                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32864                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32865                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 32866 00002A9C C3                      	retn

 32885 00002AAA EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next

 32888                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs

 32890                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 32891                                  ;	; ds = cs
 32892                                  ;	retn
 32893                                  
 32894                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32895                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 32896                                  
 32897                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32898                                  
 32899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32900                                  ;
 32901                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32902                                  ;
 32903                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32904                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32905                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32906                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32907                                  ;
 32908                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32909                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32910                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32911                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32912                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32913                                  ;
 32914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32915                                  
 32916                                  umb_coalesce:
 32917                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32918                                  	; ds = cs
 32919 00002AAC 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32920                                  
 32921 00002AAD 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32922                                  
 32923                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32924                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32925 00002AAF 8E06[821E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32926 00002AB3 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32927                                  uc_nextfree:
 32928 00002AB8 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32929 00002ABA 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32930                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32931 00002ABC 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32932 00002AC1 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32933                                  					; N: get next arena
 32934 00002AC3 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32935 00002AC6 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32936 00002AC8 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32937                                  uc_again:
 32938 00002ACA E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32939 00002ACD 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32940                                  uc_check:
 32941 00002ACF 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32942 00002AD4 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32943                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32944 00002AD6 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32945 00002ADB 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32946                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32947 00002ADC 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32948 00002AE0 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32949 00002AE3 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32950 00002AE5 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32951                                  
 32952                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32953                                  ;uc_done:
 32954                                  	;retn

 32976                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es

 32978 00002AFD 8C06[6D1E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 32979                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32980 00002B01 803E[811E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0

 32982                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it

 33003                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33004                                  ;
 33005                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 33006                                  ;
 33007                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 33008                                  ;
 33009                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33010                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33011                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33012                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33013                                  ;				NC
 33014                                  ;			  else 
 33015                                  ;				CY
 33016                                  ;
 33017                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 33018                                  ;
 33019                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33020                                  
 33021                                  umb_allocate:
 33022                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33023                                  	; ds = cs
 33024 00002B15 50                      	push	ax
 33025 00002B16 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33026 00002B18 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 33027                                  					;   possible
 33028                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33029 00002B1B FF1E[6B1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33030                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33031                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33032                                  					; the largest UMB
 33033 00002B1F 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 33034 00002B21 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 33035                                  	
 33036 00002B23 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33037                                  
 33038                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33039 00002B25 FF1E[6B1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33040                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33041

 33043                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 33044                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33045 00002B2C 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 33046                                  ua_err:
 33047 00002B2E F9                      	stc	
 33048                                  
 33049                                  	;clc
 33050                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33051                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33052                                  	; cf=0
 33053                                  	;clc 
 33054                                  ua_done:
 33055 00002B2F 58                      	pop	ax
 33056 00002B30 C3                      	retn
 33057                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33058                                  ;ua_err:
 33059                                  	;stc
 33060                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 33067                                  ;

 33075                                  get_next:

 33078                                  _get_next_:

 33080 00002B3A 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length

 33082 00002B3F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 33085                                  	; 11/12/2022

 33087                                  	;clc
 33088 00002B41 C3                      	retn

 33096                                  ;
 33097                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 33098                                  ;

 33118

 33131

 33140                                  					; mark as free

 33142 00002B80 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33143                                  
 33144                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]

 33149                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 33150                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 33151                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 33152                                  					;  just below Top of Mem

 33155

 33218 00002BC0 2B1E[651E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33219 00002BC4 8E06[651E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33220                                  	
 33221 00002BC8 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33222 00002BCB CD21                    	int	21h
 33223                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33224                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33225                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs

 33230 00002BD9 5B                      	pop	bx

 33257                                  ulu_next:

 33261 00002BFA 7404                    	je	short ulu_found

 33272                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33273                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33274                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33275                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33276                                  
 33277                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33278                                  ;
 33279                                  ; Summary:
 33280                                  ;
 33281                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33282                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33283                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33284                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33285                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33286                                  ;
 33287                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33288                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33289                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33290                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33291                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33292                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33293                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33294                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33295                                  ;
 33296                                  ; Example:
 33297                                  ;
 33298                                  ;   [menu]
 33299                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33300                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33301                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33302                                  ;
 33303                                  ;   [network]
 33304                                  ;   include misc
 33305                                  ;   device=foo
 33306                                  ;
 33307                                  ;   [misc]
 33308                                  ;   device=bar
 33309                                  ;   include alternate
 33310                                  ;
 33311                                  ;   [alternate]
 33312                                  ;   device=tar
 33313                                  ;
 33314                                  ;
 33315                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33316                                  ;
 33317                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33318                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33319                                  ;
 33320                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33321                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33322                                  ;   following order:
 33323                                  ;
 33324                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33325                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33326                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33327                                  ;
 33328                                  
 33329                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33330                                  
 33331                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33332                                  
 33333                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33334                                  
 33335                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33336                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33337                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33338                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33339                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33340                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33341                                  
 33342                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33343                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33344                                  
 33345                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33346                                  
 33347                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33348                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33349                                  
 33350 00002C08 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 33465                                  ;
 33466                                  ; procedure : parseline
 33467                                  ;
 33468                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 33469                                  ;
 33470                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33471                                  
 33472                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33473                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 33474                                  
 33475                                  parseline:
 33476                                  	push	ds
 33477                                  
 33478                                  	push	cs
 33479                                  	pop	ds
 33480                                  
 33481                                  nextswtch:
 33482                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 33483                                  	je	short done_line
 33484                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 33485                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 33486                                  
 33487                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 33488                                  
 33489                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 33490                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 33491                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 33492                                  	je	short getparm
 33493                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 33494                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 33495                                  
 33496                                  getparm:
 33497                                  	call	check_switch
 33498                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 33499                                  	jc	short swterr
 33500                                  getnext:
 33501                                  	call	getchr
 33502                                  	jc	short done_line
 33503                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 33504                                  swterr:
 33505                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 33506                                  
 33507                                  done_line:
 33508                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33509                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 33510                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 33511                                  	jnz	short okay
 33512                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 33513                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 33514                                  
 33515                                  okay:
 33516                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 33517                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 33518                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 33519                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 33520                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 33521                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33522                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33523                                  	; cf=0
 33524                                  	;clc
 33525                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 33526                                  exitpl:
 33527                                  	pop	ds
 33528                                  	retn
 33529                                  put_back:
 33530                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 33531                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 33532                                  	jmp	short done_line
 33533                                  
 33534                                  %endif

 33538                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 33539                                  ;
 33540                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 33541                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 33542                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 33543                                  ; error.
 33544                                  ;
 33545                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33546                                  
 33547                                  ; 09/09/2023
 33548                                  
 33549                                  err_swtch:
 33550 00002C5C 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 33551                                  err_check:
 33552 00002C5E F9                      	stc
 33553                                  err_chk:
 33554                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 33555 00002C5F C3                      	retn
 33556                                  
 33557                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33558

 33564 00002C67 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 33565                                  	;jb	short err_check

 33636                                  ; procedure : process_num
 33637                                  ;
 33638                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 33639                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 33640                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 33641                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 33642                                  ;

 33646                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)

 33671                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33672                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33673                                  	; cf=0
 33674 00002CC2 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 33675                                  try_t:

 33677 00002CC5 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 33678                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33721                                  ; procedure : parseline
 33722                                  ;
 33723                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 33724                                  ;
 33725                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33726                                  
 33727                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33728                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 33729                                  parseline:
 33730                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33731                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 33732                                  
 33733                                  	;push	ds ; *
 33734                                  
 33735                                  	;push	cs ; *
 33736                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 33737                                  
 33738                                  nextswtch:
 33739 00002CDD 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 33740 00002CDF 741C                    	je	short done_line
 33741 00002CE1 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 33742 00002CE3 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 33743                                  
 33744                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 33745                                  
 33746 00002CE5 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 33747 00002CE7 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 33748 00002CE9 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'

 33750 00002CED F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 33751                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 33752                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33753                                  swterr:
 33754 00002CEE C3                      	retn
 33755                                  
 33756                                  getparm:
 33757 00002CEF E86EFF                  	call	check_switch
 33758 00002CF2 891E[9335]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 33759 00002CF6 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 33760                                  getnext:
 33761 00002CF8 E8E002                  	call	getchr
 33762                                  	;jc	short done_line
 33763                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 33764                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33765 00002CFB 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 33766                                  ;swterr:
 33767                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 33768                                  
 33769                                  done_line:
 33770                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33771 00002CFD F606[9335]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 33772                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 33773 00002D02 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 33774 00002D04 F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 33775                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 33776                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33777 00002D05 C3                      	retn
 33778                                  
 33779                                  ;exitpl:
 33780                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33781                                  	; ds = cs
 33782                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 33783                                  	;retn
 33784                                  
 33785                                  put_back:
 33786 00002D06 FF06[D203]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 33787 00002D0A FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 33788 00002D0E EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 33789                                  
 33790                                  okay:

 33793 00002D16 A3[6C34]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
