 33809                                  ;
 33810                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33811                                  ;
 33812                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33813                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33814                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33815                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33816                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33817                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33818                                  ;
 33819                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33820                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33821                                  ;
 33822                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33823                                  ;
 33824                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33825                                  
 33826                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33827                                  
 33828                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33829                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33830                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33831                                  	; ds = cs
 33832                                  	
 33833 00002D1F 06                      	push	es
 33834                                  
 33835 00002D20 0E                      	push	cs
 33836 00002D21 07                      	pop	es
 33837                                  
 33838 00002D22 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33839 00002D24 8A1E[6B34]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33840 00002D28 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33841 00002D2B 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33842                                  
 33843 00002D2D C706[6E34]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33844                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33845                                  got_80:
 33846 00002D33 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 33847 00002D35 8BB7[1236]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 33848                                  
 33849                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 33850                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33851 00002D39 BF[7134]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 33852 00002D3C B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 33853 00002D3F FC                      	cld
 33854                                  	;repe	movsb
 33855                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33856 00002D40 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 33857                                  
 33858 00002D42 07                      	pop	es
 33859                                  
 33860                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33861 00002D43 F606[9335]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33862                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33863 00002D48 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 33864                                  
 33865 00002D4A A1[9035]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 33866                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 33867 00002D4D A3[7E34]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 33868                                  
 33869                                  see_heads:
 33870                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33871 00002D50 F606[9335]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 33872                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 33873 00002D55 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 33874                                  
 33875 00002D57 A1[8E35]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 33876                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 33877 00002D5A A3[8034]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 33878                                  
 33879                                  heads_not_altered:
 33880                                  
 33881                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 33882                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 33883                                  
 33884                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 33885                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33886                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 33887                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33888 00002D5D B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 33889 00002D60 A2[7334]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 33890                                  
 33891 00002D63 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 33892                                  
 33893                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 33894                                  
 33895                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 33896                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33897 00002D65 8A3E[7B34]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 33898                                  
 33899                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33900                                  	; ax = 2
 33901 00002D69 3906[8034]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 33902                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 33903 00002D6D 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 33904                                  
 33905 00002D6F 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 33906                                  
 33907                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 33908                                  
 33909 00002D71 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 33910                                  
 33911                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33912                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33913                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33914                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33915                                  
 33916                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33917                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33918                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33919                                  
 33920 00002D73 833E[7E34]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 33921 00002D78 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 33922 00002D7A 833E[6E34]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 33923 00002D7F 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 33924                                  
 33925                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 33926                                  
 33927 00002D81 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33928                                  
 33929                                  ;	check for 320K
 33930                                  
 33931                                  not_144m:
 33932 00002D83 833E[6E34]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33933 00002D88 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33934 00002D8A 833E[7E34]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33935 00002D8F 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33936                                  
 33937 00002D91 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 33938 00002D93 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 33939                                  
 33940                                  only_one_head:
 33941                                  
 33942                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 33943                                  
 33944 00002D95 803E[6B34]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33945 00002D9A 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33946                                  
 33947                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33948                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33949                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 33950                                  
 33951 00002D9C B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 33952 00002D9E 833E[7E34]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33953                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33954 00002DA3 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 33955                                  
 33956 00002DA5 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 33957                                  
 33958                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 33959                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 33960                                  
 33961                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 33962                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33963                                  	; ax = 2
 33964 00002DA7 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 33965 00002DA8 A2[7334]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 33966                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 33967                                  
 33968                                  got_correct_mediad:
 33969 00002DAB 881E[7B34]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 33970                                  
 33971                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 33972                                  
 33973 00002DAF A1[6E34]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 33974 00002DB2 F726[8034]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 33975 00002DB6 F726[7E34]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 33976 00002DBA A3[7934]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 33977 00002DBD F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 33978                                  
 33979 00002DBE C3                      	retn
 33980                                  
 33981                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 34441                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]

 34445 00002F6F C3                      	retn
 34446                                  noget:
 34447 00002F70 59                      	pop	cx
 34448                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34449                                  	; ds = cs
 34450                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 34451                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 34452 00002F71 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di

 34460                                  ;;	retn

 34465                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...

 34469                                  ;;endif

 34474                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34475                                  ;
 34476                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34477                                  ;
 34478                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34479                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34480                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34481                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34482                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34483                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34484                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34485                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34486                                  ;
 34487                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34488                                  
 34489                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34490                                  
 34491                                  skip_comment:
 34492 00002F80 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34493                                  
 34494                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34495                                  	; ds = cs	
 34496                                  
 34497 00002F82 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34498                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34499 00002F87 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34500                                  
 34501 00002F89 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34502                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34503 00002F8E 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34504                                  
 34505 00002F90 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34506                                  	
 34507 00002F93 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34508                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34509 00002F97 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34510                                  
 34511 00002F99 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34512                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34513 00002F9E 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34514                                  
 34515 00002FA0 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34516                                  	
 34517 00002FA4 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34518                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34519 00002FA8 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34520                                  skip_cmmt:
 34521 00002FAA E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34522 00002FAC 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34523 00002FAF 46                      	inc	si
 34524 00002FB0 49                      	dec	cx
 34525 00002FB1 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34526 00002FB3 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34527                                  no_commt:
 34528 00002FB5 C3                      	retn
 34529                                  
 34530                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34531                                  %if 0
 34532                                  
 34533                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34534                                  
 34535                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34536                                  ;
 34537                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34538                                  ;
 34539                                  ;   INPUT
 34540                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34541                                  ;
 34542                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34543                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34544                                  ;
 34545                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34546                                  ;       All
 34547                                  ;
 34548                                  ;   HISTORY
 34549                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34550                                  ;
 34551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34552                                  
 34553                                  kbd_read:
 34554                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34555                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34556                                  
 34557                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34558                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34559                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34560                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34561                                  kbd_loop:
 34562                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 34563                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34564                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34565                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34566                                          int     16h             ;
 34567                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34568                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34569                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34570                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34571                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34572                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 34573                                  
 34574                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 34575                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34576                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34577                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34578                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34579                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34580                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34581                                          int     16h             ;
 34582                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34583                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34584                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 34585                                          inc     bx
 34586                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34587                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34588                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34589                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34590                                          int     16h             ;
 34591                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34592                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34593                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34594                                  
 34595                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34596                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34597                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34598                                  	
 34599                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34600                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34601                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34602                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34603                                          call    print
 34604                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34605                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 34606                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34607                                  kbd_notf5:
 34608                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34609                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34610                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34611                                  
 34612                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34613                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34614                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34615                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34616                                          call    print           ;
 34617                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34618                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34619                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34620                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 34621                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34622                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34623                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 34624                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34625                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34626                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34627                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34628                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34629                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34630                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34631                                          retn			;
 34632                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34633                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34634                                          retn			;
 34635                                  
 34636                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34637                                  ;
 34638                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34639                                  ;
 34640                                  ;   INPUT
 34641                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34642                                  ;
 34643                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34644                                  ;       None
 34645                                  ;
 34646                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34647                                  ;       None
 34648                                  ;
 34649                                  ;   HISTORY
 34650                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34651                                  ;
 34652                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34653                                  
 34654                                  set_numlock:
 34655                                          push    ax
 34656                                          push    ds
 34657                                          sub     ax,ax
 34658                                          mov     ds,ax
 34659                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34660                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34661                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 34662                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34663                                          jmp     short set_done
 34664                                  not_off:
 34665                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34666                                          stc
 34667                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 34668                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 34669                                  set_done:
 34670                                          pop     ds
 34671                                          pop     ax
 34672                                          retn
 34673                                  
 34674                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34675                                  
 34676                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34677                                  ;
 34678                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34679                                  ;
 34680                                  ;   INPUT
 34681                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34682                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34683                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34684                                  ;
 34685                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34686                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34687                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34688                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34689                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34690                                  ;
 34691                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34692                                  ;       All
 34693                                  ;
 34694                                  ;   NOTES
 34695                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34696                                  ;
 34697                                  ;   HISTORY
 34698                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34699                                  ;
 34700                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34701                                  
 34702                                  menu_check:
 34703                                  
 34704                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 34705                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34706                                  
 34707                                          push    cx              ;
 34708                                          push    si              ;
 34709                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34710                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34711                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34712                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34713                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34714                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34715                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34716                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34717                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34718                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34719                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34720                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34721                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34722                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34723                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 34724                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34725                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34726                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34727                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34728                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34729                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34730                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34731                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34732                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34733                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34734                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34735                                          call    get_char        ;
 34736                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34737                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34738                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34739                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34740                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34741                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34742                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34743                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34744                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34745                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34746                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34747                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34748                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34749                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34750                                          pop     si              ;
 34751                                          pop     cx              ;
 34752                                  
 34753                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34754                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34755                                  
 34756                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34757                                          jnz	short menu_search
 34758                                  ;
 34759                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34760                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34761                                  ;
 34762                                          call    kbd_read
 34763                                          jnc	short menu_search
 34764                                          jmp	menu_abort
 34765                                  
 34766                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34767                                  
 34768                                  menu_search:
 34769                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34770                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 34771                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34772                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 34773                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34774                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34775                                  
 34776                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34777                                  
 34778                                  menu_color:
 34779                                          push    cx              ;
 34780                                          push    dx              ;
 34781                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34782                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34783                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34784                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34785                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34786                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34787                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34788                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34789                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34790                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34791                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34792                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34793                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34794                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 34795                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34796                                  check_color:                    ;
 34797                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34798                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 34799                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34800                                  set_color:
 34801                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34802                                          pop     dx              ;
 34803                                          pop     cx              ;
 34804                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34805                                  
 34806                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34807                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34808                                  
 34809                                  menu_found:
 34810                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34811                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34812                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34813                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34814                                  
 34815                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34816                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34817                                  
 34818                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34819                                  
 34820                                  menu_process:
 34821                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34822                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34823                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34824                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34825                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34826                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34827                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34828                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34829                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34830                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34831                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34832                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34833                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34834                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34835                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 34836                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34837                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34838                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34839                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34840                                          stc                     ;
 34841                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34842                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34843                                  menu_numlock:
 34844                                          call    set_numlock
 34845                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34846                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34847                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34848                                  
 34849                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34850                                  
 34851                                  menu_default:
 34852                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 34853                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 34854                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 34855                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 34856                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 34857                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 34858                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 34859                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 34860                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 34861                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 34862                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 34863                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 34864                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 34865                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 34866                                  timeout_skip:
 34867                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34868                                  
 34869                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 34870                                  
 34871                                  menu_item:
 34872                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 34873                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 34874                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 34875                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34876                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 34877                                          stc                     ;
 34878                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 34879                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 34880                                  
 34881                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 34882                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 34883                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 34884                                  
 34885                                  menu_itemfound:
 34886                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 34887                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 34888                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 34889                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 34890                                  
 34891                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 34892                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 34893                                  ;   description...
 34894                                  
 34895                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 34896                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 34897                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 34898                                          call    skip_token      ;
 34899                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34900                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 34901                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34902                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 34903                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 34904                                  
 34905                                  menu_nextitem:
 34906                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34907                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 34908                                  
 34909                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 34910                                  
 34911                                  menu_getdefault:
 34912                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 34913                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 34914                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 34915                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 34916                                  menu_valid:
 34917                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 34918                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 34919                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 34920                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 34921                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 34922                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 34923                                  menu_chkdefault:
 34924                                          push    bx              ;
 34925                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34926                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34927                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 34928                                          push    ds              ;
 34929                                          push    es              ;
 34930                                          pop     ds              ;
 34931                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 34932                                          pop     ds              ;
 34933                                          pop     bx              ;
 34934                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 34935                                          inc     bx              ;
 34936                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 34937                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 34938                                  menu_nodefault:
 34939                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 34940                                  menu_setdefault:
 34941                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 34942                                  
 34943                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 34944                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 34945                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 34946                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 34947                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 34948                                  ;   with no timeout)
 34949                                  
 34950                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 34951                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 34952                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 34953                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 34954                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 34955                                  
 34956                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 34957                                  
 34958                                  menu_display:
 34959                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 34960                                          int     10h             ;
 34961                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 34962                                          int     10h             ;
 34963                                          push    es              ;
 34964                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 34965                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 34966                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 34967                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 34968                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 34969                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 34970                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 34971                                          int     10h             ;
 34972                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 34973                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 34974                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 34975                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 34976                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 34977                                  	dec     dl              ;
 34978                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 34979                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 34980                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 34981                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 34982                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 34983                                  menu_clear:
 34984                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 34985                                          pop     es              ;
 34986                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 34987                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 34988                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 34989                                  
 34990                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34991                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 34992                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34993                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 34994                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 34995                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 34996                                          int     10h             ;
 34997                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 34998                                          call    print           ;
 34999                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 35000                                          int     10h             ;
 35001                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 35002                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 35003                                  
 35004                                  menu_nostatus:
 35005                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 35006                                  menu_disploop:
 35007                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 35008                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 35009                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 35010                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 35011                                  
 35012                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 35013                                  
 35014                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 35015                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35016                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 35017                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35018                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 35019                                          int     10h             ;
 35020                                  
 35021                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 35022                                          call    print           ;
 35023                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 35024                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 35025                                          call    print           ;
 35026                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 35027                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35028                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 35029                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 35030                                  
 35031                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 35032                                  
 35033                                  menu_autoselect:
 35034                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 35035                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 35036                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 35037                                  menu_abort:
 35038                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 35039                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 35040                                  
 35041                                  normal_boot:
 35042                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 35043                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 35044                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 35045                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35046                                          jmp     menu_search
 35047                                  
 35048                                  not_topmenu:
 35049                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35050                                          jne	short not_submenu
 35051                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35052                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35053                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 35054                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35055                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 35056                                          jmp     menu_found
 35057                                  
 35058                                  not_submenu:
 35059                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 35060                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35061                                  
 35062                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 35063                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 35064                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 35065                                  
 35066                                  no_selection:
 35067                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 35068                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 35069                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35070                                          push    ds              ;
 35071                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 35072                                          sub     di,di           ;
 35073                                  
 35074                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 35075                                  ;
 35076                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 35077                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 35078                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 35079                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 35080                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 35081                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 35082                                  ;
 35083                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 35084                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 35085                                  
 35086                                  copyblock_loop:
 35087                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 35088                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 35089                                          pop     bx              ;
 35090                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35091                                  
 35092                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 35093                                  
 35094                                  copyblock_begin:
 35095                                          push    ax              ;
 35096                                          push    cx              ;
 35097                                          push    si              ;
 35098                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 35099                                          mov     di,szCommon
 35100                                          push    ds              ;
 35101                                          push    cs              ;
 35102                                          pop     ds              ;
 35103                                          call    comp_names      ;
 35104                                          pop     ds              ;
 35105                                          pop     di              ;
 35106                                          pop     si              ;
 35107                                          pop     cx              ;
 35108                                          pop     ax              ;
 35109                                          je	short copyblock_check
 35110                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 35111                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 35112                                          push    di              ;
 35113                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 35114                                          push    ds              ;
 35115                                          push    es              ;
 35116                                          pop     ds              ;
 35117                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 35118                                          pop     ds              ;
 35119                                          pop     di              ;
 35120                                  copyblock_check:
 35121                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35122                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 35123                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35124                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 35125                                  
 35126                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 35127                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 35128                                          call    get_char        ;
 35129                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35130                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35131                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35132                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 35133                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 35134                                  ;
 35135                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 35136                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 35137                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 35138                                  ;
 35139                                  move_config:
 35140                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 35141                                          push    cx              ;
 35142                                  ;
 35143                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 35144                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 35145                                  ;
 35146                                   	;mov	cx,7
 35147                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 35148                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 35149                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 35150                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 35151                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 35152                                  copy_boot: 
 35153                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 35154                                          cs
 35155                                  	lodsb
 35156                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 35157                                          inc     di              ;
 35158                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 35159                                  
 35160                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 35161                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 35162                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 35163                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 35164                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 35165                                          push    cs              ;
 35166                                          pop     es              ;
 35167                                          mov     si,szCommon
 35168                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 35169                                          call    any_delim       ;
 35170                                          je	short l2	;
 35171                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35172                                          inc     si              ;
 35173                                          inc     di              ;
 35174                                          loop    l1              ;
 35175                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 35176                                          pop     es              ;
 35177                                  
 35178                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 35179                                  
 35180                                          sub     di,di           ;
 35181                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35182                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35183                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 35184                                  
 35185                                          push    cx              ;
 35186                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 35187                                          pop     cx              ;
 35188                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 35189                                          pop     ds              ;
 35190                                  
 35191                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 35192                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 35193                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 35194                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 35195                                  ;   is empty.
 35196                                  
 35197                                          push    es              ;
 35198                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35199                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 35200                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 35201                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35202                                          pop     es
 35203                                  
 35204                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 35205                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 35206                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 35207                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 35208                                  
 35209                                  menu_done:
 35210                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 35211                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 35212                                          push    es              ;
 35213                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 35214                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35215                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 35216                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 35217                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 35218                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 35219                                          pop     es              ;
 35220                                  menu_exit:
 35221                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 35222                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 35223                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 35224                                          retn
 35225                                  
 35226                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35227                                  ;
 35228                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35229                                  ;
 35230                                  ;   INPUT
 35231                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 35232                                  ;
 35233                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35234                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 35235                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 35236                                  ;
 35237                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35238                                  ;       None
 35239                                  ;
 35240                                  ;   NOTES
 35241                                  ;       None
 35242                                  ;
 35243                                  ;   HISTORY
 35244                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35245                                  ;
 35246                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35247                                  
 35248                                  copy_envvar:
 35249                                          push    cx              ;
 35250                                          push    si              ;
 35251                                          push    ds              ;
 35252                                          push    es              ;
 35253                                          push    es              ;
 35254                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 35255                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 35256                                  
 35257                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 35258                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 35259                                  ;   config.sys line)
 35260                                  ;
 35261                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 35262                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 35263                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 35264                                  
 35265                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 35266                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 35267                                          lodsb                   ;
 35268                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35269                                          stc                     ;
 35270                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35271                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 35272                                          stc                     ;
 35273                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35274                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 35275                                          stc                     ;
 35276                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35277                                          inc     cx              ;
 35278                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 35279                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 35280                                          mov     al,0            ;
 35281                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35282                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35283                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35284                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35285                                  copy_varsrch:
 35286                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35287                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35288                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35289                                          push    cx              ;
 35290                                          push    si              ;
 35291                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 35292                                          pop     si              ;
 35293                                          pop     cx              ;
 35294                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35295                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 35296                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 35297                                  
 35298                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 35299                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 35300                                  
 35301                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35302                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 35303                                          push    si              ;
 35304                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35305                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 35306                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 35307                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 35308                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 35309                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 35310                                  
 35311                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 35312                                  	es	; 26h
 35313                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 35314                                  
 35315                                  	pop     si
 35316                                  copy_envprep:
 35317                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 35318                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 35319                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 35320                                          je	short copy_envdel
 35321                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35322                                  
 35323                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 35324                                          push    cx              ;
 35325                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35326                                          repne   scasb           ;
 35327                                          pop     cx              ;
 35328                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 35329                                  
 35330                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 35331                                          lodsb                   ;
 35332                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 35333                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35334                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 35335                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35336                                          stosb                   ;
 35337                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35338                                  
 35339                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 35340                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
