 35341                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 35342                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 35343                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 35344                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35345                                  
 35346                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 35347                                          pop     es              ;
 35348                                          pop     ds              ;
 35349                                          pop     si              ;
 35350                                          pop     cx              ;
 35351                                  
 35352                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35353                                          retn
 35354                                  
 35355                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35356                                  ;
 35357                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 35358                                  ;
 35359                                  ;   INPUT
 35360                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35361                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35362                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 35363                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 35364                                  ;
 35365                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35366                                  ;       Same as above
 35367                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 35368                                  ;
 35369                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35370                                  ;       All
 35371                                  ;
 35372                                  ;   NOTES
 35373                                  ;       None
 35374                                  ;
 35375                                  ;   HISTORY
 35376                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35377                                  ;
 35378                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35379                                  
 35380                                  copy_block:
 35381                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 35382                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 35383                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35384                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 35385                                          je	short copy_done ;
 35386                                  
 35387                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 35388                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 35389                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 35390                                  
 35391                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 35392                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 35393                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 35394                                  
 35395                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 35396                                          push    di              ;
 35397                                  
 35398                                          mov     di,szMenu
 35399                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 35400                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 35401                                  
 35402                                          mov     di,szCommon
 35403                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 35404                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 35405                                  
 35406                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 35407                                          call    srch_block      ;
 35408                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 35409                                          pop     di              ;
 35410                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 35411                                          push    cx              ;
 35412                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 35413                                          push    si              ;
 35414                                          dec     dx              ;
 35415                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 35416                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 35417                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 35418                                          pop     si              ;
 35419                                          pop     cx              ;
 35420                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 35421                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 35422                                  
 35423                                  copy_skip:
 35424                                          pop     di
 35425                                  copy_error:
 35426                                          clc                     ;
 35427                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 35428                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 35429                                  
 35430                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 35431                                  
 35432                                  copy_line:
 35433                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35434                                          inc     di              ;
 35435                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 35436                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 35437                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 35438                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 35439                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 35440                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 35441                                          inc     di              ;
 35442                                          inc     di              ;
 35443                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 35444                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 35445                                          call    get_char        ;
 35446                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 35447                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35448                                          inc     di              ;
 35449                                  copy_next:
 35450                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 35451                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 35452                                  
 35453                                  copy_nextline:
 35454                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35455                                          jmp     short copy_block
 35456                                  
 35457                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35458                                  ;copy_done:
 35459                                          ;retn
 35460                                  
 35461                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35462                                  ;
 35463                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 35464                                  ;
 35465                                  ;   INPUT
 35466                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 35467                                  ;
 35468                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35469                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 35470                                  ;
 35471                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35472                                  ;       DX
 35473                                  ;
 35474                                  ;   NOTES
 35475                                  ;       None
 35476                                  ;
 35477                                  ;   HISTORY
 35478                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35479                                  ;
 35480                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35481                                  
 35482                                  get_linenum:
 35483                                          push    ax              ;
 35484                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 35485                                          push    cx              ;
 35486                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 35487                                          push    si              ;
 35488                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35489                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 35490                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 35491                                          call    skip_line       ;
 35492                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 35493                                          inc     bx              ;
 35494                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 35495                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 35496                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 35497                                          pop     si              ;
 35498                                          pop     cx              ;
 35499                                          pop     ax              ;
 35500                                          retn
 35501                                  
 35502                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35503                                  ;
 35504                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 35505                                  ;
 35506                                  ;   INPUT
 35507                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 35508                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 35509                                  ;
 35510                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35511                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 35512                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 35513                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 35514                                  ;
 35515                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35516                                  ;       None
 35517                                  ;
 35518                                  ;   NOTES
 35519                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 35520                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 35521                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 35522                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 35523                                  ;
 35524                                  ;   HISTORY
 35525                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35526                                  ;
 35527                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35528                                  
 35529                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 35530                                          push    ax              ;
 35531                                          push    cx              ;
 35532                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35533                                          push    si              ;
 35534                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35535                                          push    ds              ;
 35536                                          push    es              ;
 35537                                          pop     ds              ;
 35538                                          call    find_block      ;
 35539                                          mov     di,si           ;
 35540                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 35541                                          pop     ds              ;
 35542                                          pop     si              ;
 35543                                          pop     cx              ;
 35544                                          pop     ax              ;
 35545                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 35546                                          retn			;
 35547                                  
 35548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35549                                  ;
 35550                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 35551                                  ;
 35552                                  ;   INPUT
 35553                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 35554                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 35555                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 35556                                  ;
 35557                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35558                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 35559                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35560                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35561                                  ;
 35562                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35563                                  ;       AX
 35564                                  ;
 35565                                  ;   NOTES
 35566                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 35567                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 35568                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 35569                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 35570                                  ;
 35571                                  ;   HISTORY
 35572                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35573                                  ;
 35574                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35575                                  
 35576                                  find_block:
 35577                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 35578                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 35579                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 35580                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 35581                                          je	short check_line ; no
 35582                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 35583                                          jne	short next_line	;
 35584                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35585                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 35586                                  check_line:
 35587                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35588                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 35589                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 35590                                  next_line:
 35591                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 35592                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 35593                                  ;find_exit:
 35594                                  ;	retn
 35595                                  
 35596                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35597                                  ;
 35598                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 35599                                  ;
 35600                                  ;   INPUT
 35601                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 35602                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35603                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35604                                  ;
 35605                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35606                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 35607                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35608                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35609                                  ;
 35610                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35611                                  ;       AX
 35612                                  ;
 35613                                  ;   NOTES
 35614                                  ;       None
 35615                                  ;
 35616                                  ;   HISTORY
 35617                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35618                                  ;
 35619                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35620                                  
 35621                                  comp_names:
 35622                                          push    di              ;
 35623                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 35624                                          call    get_char        ;
 35625                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 35626                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 35627                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 35628                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 35629                                          inc     di              ;
 35630                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 35631                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 35632                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 35633                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 35634                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 35635                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 35636                                          pop     di              ;
 35637                                          retn			;
 35638                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 35639                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 35640                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35641                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35642                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35643                                  
 35644                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35645                                  
 35646                                  comp_names_safe:
 35647                                          push    ax
 35648                                          push    cx
 35649                                          push	si
 35650                                          push    ds
 35651                                          push    cs
 35652                                          pop     ds
 35653                                          call    comp_names
 35654                                          pop     ds
 35655                                  	pop	si
 35656                                          pop     cx
 35657                                          pop     ax
 35658                                          retn
 35659                                  
 35660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35661                                  ;
 35662                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35663                                  ;
 35664                                  ;   INPUT
 35665                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35666                                  ;
 35667                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35668                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35669                                  ;
 35670                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35671                                  ;       None
 35672                                  ;
 35673                                  ;   NOTES
 35674                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35675                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35676                                  ;
 35677                                  ;   HISTORY
 35678                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35679                                  ;
 35680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35681                                  
 35682                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35683                                          push    ax              ;
 35684                                          push    bx              ;
 35685                                          push    cx              ;
 35686                                          push    dx              ;
 35687                                          push    si              ;
 35688                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35689                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35690                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35691                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35692                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35693                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35694                                          add     dh,3            ;
 35695                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 35696                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35697                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35698                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35699                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35700                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35701                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35702                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35703                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 35704                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35705                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 35706                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35707                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35708                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35709                                  print_other:                    ;
 35710                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 35711                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35712                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35713                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35714                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35715                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35716                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35717                                          int     10h             ;
 35718                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35719                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35720                                          int     10h             ;
 35721                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35722                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35723                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35724                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35725                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35726                                          int     10h             ;
 35727                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35728                                          mov	ax,0920h
 35729                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35730                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35731                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35732                                          int     10h             ;
 35733                                          push    es              ;
 35734                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35735                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35736                                          inc     di              ;
 35737                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35738                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 35739                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 35740                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35741                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 35742                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35743                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35744                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35745                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35746                                          int     10h             ;
 35747                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35748                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35749                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 35750                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35751                                          int     10h             ;
 35752                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 35753                                  print_done:                     ;
 35754                                          pop     es              ;
 35755                                          pop     dx              ;
 35756                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35757                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35758                                          pop     si              ;
 35759                                          pop     dx              ;
 35760                                          pop     cx              ;
 35761                                          pop     bx              ;
 35762                                          pop     ax              ;
 35763                                          retn			;
 35764                                  
 35765                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35766                                  ;
 35767                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35768                                  ;
 35769                                  ;   INPUT
 35770                                  ;       None
 35771                                  ;
 35772                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35773                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35774                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35775                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35776                                  ;
 35777                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35778                                  ;       None
 35779                                  ;
 35780                                  ;   NOTES
 35781                                  ;       None
 35782                                  ;
 35783                                  ;   HISTORY
 35784                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35785                                  ;
 35786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35787                                  
 35788                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35789                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35790                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35791                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35792                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35793                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35794                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35795                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35796                                          int     21h             ;
 35797                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35798                                  check_time:
 35799                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35800                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35801                                          jae	short show_time	;
 35802                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35803                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35804                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35805                                  show_time:
 35806                                          push    bx              ;
 35807                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35808                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35809                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35810                                          int     10h             ;
 35811                                          push    dx              ;
 35812                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35813                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35814                                          int     10h             ;
 35815                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35816                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35817                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35818                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35819                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35820                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35821                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35822                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35823                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35824                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35825                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35826                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35827                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35828                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35829                                          pop     dx
 35830                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35831                                          int     10h             ;
 35832                                          pop     bx              ;
 35833                                  input_key:
 35834                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35835                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35836                                          int     21h             ;
 35837                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35838                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35839                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35840                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35841                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35842                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35843                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35844                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35845                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35846                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35847                                  got_time:
 35848                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35849                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35850                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35851                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35852                                  got_key:
 35853                                          push    ax              ;
 35854                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35855                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35856                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35857                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35858                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35859                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35860                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35861                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35862                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35863                                          pop     bx   		;
 35864                                  
 35865                                  timeout_disabled:
 35866                                          pop     ax              ;
 35867                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35868                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35869                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35870                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35871                                  
 35872                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35873                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35874                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35875                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35876                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35877                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35878                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35879                                          jmp     short print1
 35880                                  not_up:
 35881                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35882                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35883                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35884                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35885                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35886                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35887                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35888                                  print1: 
 35889                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35890                                  print2: 
 35891                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35892                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35893                                  to_input_key:
 35894                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35895                                  not_down:
 35896                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35897                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35898                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35899                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35900                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35901                                          call    show_status     ;
 35902                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35903                                  not_f8:
 35904                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35905                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35906                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35907                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35908                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35909                                  
 35910                                  normal_key:
 35911                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35912                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35913                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35914                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35915                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35916                                          retn			;
 35917                                  not_backspace:
 35918                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35919                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35920                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35921                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35922                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35923                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35924                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35925                                          jmp	short print2
 35926                                  
 35927                                  select_done:
 35928                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35929                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35930                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35931                                  
 35932                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35933                                  
 35934                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35935                                  
 35936                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35937                                  ;
 35938                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35939                                  ;
 35940                                  ;   INPUT
 35941                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35942                                  ;
 35943                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35944                                  ;       None
 35945                                  ;
 35946                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35947                                  ;       None
 35948                                  ;
 35949                                  ;   NOTES
 35950                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35951                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35952                                  ;
 35953                                  ;   HISTORY
 35954                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35955                                  ;
 35956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35957                                  
 35958                                  disp_input:
 35959                                          push    ax
 35960                                          cmp     al,' '
 35961                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35962                                          mov     al,' '
 35963                                  disp_ok:
 35964                                          mov     dl,al
 35965                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35966                                          int     21h
 35967                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35968                                          call    print
 35969                                          pop     ax
 35970                                          retn
 35971                                  
 35972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35973                                  
 35974                                  disp_num:
 35975                                          push    bx
 35976                                          add     al,'0'
 35977                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35978                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35979                                          mov     cx,1
 35980                                          int     10h
 35981                                          pop     bx
 35982                                          retn
 35983                                  
 35984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35985                                  ;
 35986                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35987                                  ;
 35988                                  ;   INPUT
 35989                                  ;       None
 35990                                  ;
 35991                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35992                                  ;       None
 35993                                  ;
 35994                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35995                                  ;       None
 35996                                  ;
 35997                                  ;   NOTES
 35998                                  ;       None
 35999                                  ;
 36000                                  ;   HISTORY
 36001                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36002                                  ;
 36003                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36004                                  
 36005                                  show_status:
 36006                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 36007                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36008                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36009                                          int     10h             ;
 36010                                          push    dx              ; save it
 36011                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36012                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 36013                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36014                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 36015                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 36016                                          int     10h             ;
 36017                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36018                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 36019                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 36020                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 36021                                  show_onoff: 
 36022                                          int     10h
 36023                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 36024                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 36025                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 36026                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 36027                                  
 36028                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 36029                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 36030                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 36031                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 36032                                  show_noton:                     ;
 36033                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 36034                                          int     10h             ;
 36035                                  show_done:                      ;
 36036                                          pop     dx              ;
 36037                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36038                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 36039                                          pop     bx              ;
 36040                                          retn			;
 36041                                  
 36042                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36043                                  
 36044                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36045                                  ;
 36046                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 36047                                  ;
 36048                                  ;   INPUT
 36049                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36050                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36051                                  ;
 36052                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36053                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36054                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36055                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36056                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36057                                  ;
 36058                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36059                                  ;       AX
 36060                                  ;
 36061                                  ;   NOTES
 36062                                  ;       None
 36063                                  ;
 36064                                  ;   HISTORY
 36065                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36066                                  ;
 36067                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36068                                  
 36069                                  skip_token:
 36070                                          call    get_char
 36071                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 36072                                          call    any_delim
 36073                                          jne	short skip_token
 36074                                  skip_check_eol:
 36075                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36076                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36077                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36078                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36079                                          clc
 36080                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36081                                  	retn
 36082                                  skip_token_eol:
 36083                                          stc
 36084                                  skip_token_done:
 36085                                          retn
 36086                                  
 36087                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36088                                  ;
 36089                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36090                                  ;
 36091                                  ;   INPUT
 36092                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36093                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36094                                  ;
 36095                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36096                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36097                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36098                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36099                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36100                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36101                                  ;
 36102                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36103                                  ;       AX
 36104                                  ;
 36105                                  ;   NOTES
 36106                                  ;       None
 36107                                  ;
 36108                                  ;   HISTORY
 36109                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36110                                  ;
 36111                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36112                                  
 36113                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36114                                          call    get_char        ;
 36115                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36116                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36117                                          call    delim           ;
 36118                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 36119                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36120                                  
 36121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36122                                  ;
 36123                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36124                                  ;
 36125                                  ;   INPUT
 36126                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36127                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36128                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36129                                  ;
 36130                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36131                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36132                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36133                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36134                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36135                                  ;
 36136                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36137                                  ;       AX
 36138                                  ;
 36139                                  ;   NOTES
 36140                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36141                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36142                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36143                                  ;
 36144                                  ;   HISTORY
 36145                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36146                                  ;
 36147                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36148                                  
 36149                                  skip_opt_line:
 36150                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36151                                          je	short skip_line_done
 36152                                       
 36153                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36154                                  
 36155                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36156                                  ;
 36157                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36158                                  ;
 36159                                  ;   INPUT
 36160                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36161                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36162                                  ;
 36163                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36164                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36165                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36166                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36167                                  ;
 36168                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36169                                  ;       AX
 36170                                  ;
 36171                                  ;   NOTES
 36172                                  ;       None
 36173                                  ;
 36174                                  ;   HISTORY
 36175                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36176                                  ;
 36177                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36178                                  
 36179                                  skip_line:
 36180                                          call    get_char
 36181                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 36182                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36183                                          jne	short skip_line
 36184                                  skip_line_done:
 36185                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36186                                          retn
 36187                                  
 36188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36189                                  ;
 36190                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36191                                  ;
 36192                                  ;   INPUT
 36193                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36194                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36195                                  ;
 36196                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36197                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36198                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36199                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36200                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36201                                  ;
 36202                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36203                                  ;       AX
 36204                                  ;
 36205                                  ;   NOTES
 36206                                  ;       None
 36207                                  ;
 36208                                  ;   HISTORY
 36209                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36210                                  ;
 36211                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36212                                  
 36213                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36214                                  
 36215                                  get_number:
 36216                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36217                                  num_loop:
 36218                                          call    get_char        ;
 36219                                          jc	short num_done	;
 36220                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36221                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36222                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36223                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36224                                          push    ax              ;
 36225                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36226                                          push    dx              ;
 36227                                          mul     bx              ;
 36228                                          pop     dx              ;
 36229                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36230                                          pop     ax              ;
 36231                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36232                                          cbw                     ;
 36233                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36234                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36235                                  
 36236                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36237                                  ;num_done:
 36238                                          ;retn
 36239                                  
 36240                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36241                                  ;
 36242                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36243                                  ;
 36244                                  ;   INPUT
 36245                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36246                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36247                                  ;
 36248                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36249                                  ;       AL == next character
 36250                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36251                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36252                                  ;
 36253                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36254                                  ;       AX
 36255                                  ;
 36256                                  ;   NOTES
 36257                                  ;       None
 36258                                  ;
 36259                                  ;   HISTORY
 36260                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36261                                  ;
 36262                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36263                                  
 36264                                  get_char:
 36265                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36266                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36267                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36268                                  	es	
 36269                                  	lodsb
 36270                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36271                                          retn			;
 36272                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36273                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36274                                  nearby_ret:
 36275                                          retn
 36276                                  
 36277                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36278                                  ;
 36279                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36280                                  ;
 36281                                  ;   INPUT
 36282                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36283                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36284                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36285                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36286                                  ;
 36287                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36288                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36289                                  ;
 36290                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36291                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36292                                  ;
 36293                                  ;   NOTES
 36294                                  ;       None
 36295                                  ;
 36296                                  ;   HISTORY
 36297                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36298                                  ;
 36299                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36300                                  
 36301                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36302                                  query_user:
 36303                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36304                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36305                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36306                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36307                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36308                                  qu_1:
 36309                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36310                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36311                                          push    ax                      ;
 36312                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36313                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36314                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36315                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36316                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36317                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36318                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36319                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36320                                  query_all:
 36321                                  
 36322                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36323                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36324                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36325                                  
 36326                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36327                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36328                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36329                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36330                                  
 36331                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36332                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36333                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36334                                  find_match:                             ;
 36335                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36336                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36337                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36338                                          inc     di                      ;
 36339                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36340                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36341                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36342                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36343                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36344                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36345                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36346                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36347                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36348                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36349                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36350                                          inc     di                      ;
 36351                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36352                                          int     21h                     ;
 36353                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36354                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36355                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36356                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36357                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36358                                  cmd_notset:
 36359                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36360                                  line_print:                             ;
 36361                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36362                                          es
 36363                                  	lodsb
 36364                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36365                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36366                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36367                                  non_null:                               ;
 36368                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36369                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36370                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36371                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36372                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36373                                  non_space:                              ;
 36374                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36375                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36376                                          int     21h                     ;
 36377                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36378                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36379                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36380                                  
 36381                                  generic_prompt:
 36382                                          call    print                   ;
 36383                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36384                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36385                                          int     16h                     ;
 36386                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36387                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 36388                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36389                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 36390                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36391                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36392                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36393                                  not_func:
 36394                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36395                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36396                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36397                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 36398                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36399                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 36400                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 36401                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 36402                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 36403                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 36404                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 36405                                  legal_char:                             ;
 36406                                          call    disp_input              ;
 36407                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36408                                  
 36409                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 36410                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 36411                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36412                                  	clc
 36413                                  do_cmd:
 36414                                  	pop     ax			;
 36415                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36416                                  	; cf=0
 36417                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36418                                  	retn
 36419                                  
 36420                                  skip_cmd:
 36421                                  	pop     ax			;
 36422                                  skip_all:
 36423                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 36424                                  	stc
 36425                                  	retn
 36426                                  
 36427                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36428                                  ;
 36429                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 36430                                  ;
 36431                                  ;   INPUT
 36432                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 36433                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36434                                  ;
 36435                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36436                                  ;       None
 36437                                  ;
 36438                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36439                                  ;       None
 36440                                  ;
 36441                                  ;   NOTES
 36442                                  ;       None
 36443                                  ;
