 36444                                  ;   HISTORY
 36445                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36446                                  ;
 36447                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36448                                  
 36449                                  print_error:
 36450                                          push    ax
 36451                                          push    bx
 36452                                          push    cx
 36453                                          push    dx
 36454                                          push    ds
 36455                                          push    cs
 36456                                          pop     ds
 36457                                          pushf
 36458                                          call    get_linenum
 36459                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 36460                                          call    error_line
 36461                                          popf
 36462                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 36463                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 36464                                          call    print
 36465                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 36466                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 36467                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 36468                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 36469                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 36470                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 36471                                  pe_1:     
 36472                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 36473                                          call    print
 36474                                  pe_ret: 
 36475                                  	pop     ds
 36476                                          pop     dx
 36477                                          pop     cx
 36478                                          pop     bx
 36479                                          pop     ax
 36480                                  	retn
 36481                                  
 36482                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36483                                  
 36484                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36485                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 36486                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36487                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36488                                  
 36489                                  disable_autoexec:
 36490                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36491                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36492                                  
 36493                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36494                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 36495                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36496                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 36497                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36498                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36499                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36500                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36501                                  dae_1:
 36502                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36503                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36504                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36505                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36506                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36507                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36508                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36509                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36510                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36511                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 36512                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36513                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36514                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36515                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36516                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36517                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36518                                          dec     bx                      ;
 36519                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 36520                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 36521                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 36522                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 36523                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 36524                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 36525                                          retn
 36526                                  
 36527                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 36528                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36529                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36530                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 36531                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36532                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 36533                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 36534                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 36535                                  
 36536                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36537                                  
 36538                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 36539                                  
 36540                                  
 36541                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36542                                  
 36543                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36544                                  ;
 36545                                  ; procedure : delim
 36546                                  ;
 36547                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36548                                  
 36549                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36550                                  ;
 36551                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36552                                  ;
 36553                                  ;any_delim:
 36554                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36555                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36556                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36557                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36558                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 36559                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36560                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 36561                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36562                                  ;
 36563                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36564                                  
 36565                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36566                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36567                                  delim:
 36568 00002FB6 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36569 00002FB8 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36570                                  
 36571 00002FBA 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36572 00002FBC 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36573                                  
 36574                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36575 00002FBE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36576 00002FC0 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36577 00002FC2 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36578 00002FC4 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36579 00002FC6 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36580 00002FC8 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36581 00002FCA 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36582 00002FCC 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36583 00002FCE 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36584                                  
 36585                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36586                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36587                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36588 00002FD0 F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 36589                                  ;endif
 36590                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36591                                  delim_ret:
 36592                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 36593 00002FD1 C3                      	retn
 36594

 36656                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36657                                  ;
 36658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36659                                  
 36660                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36661                                  mapcase:
 36662 00002FF2 51                      	push	cx
 36663 00002FF3 56                      	push	si
 36664 00002FF4 1E                      	push	ds
 36665                                  
 36666 00002FF5 06                      	push	es
 36667 00002FF6 1F                      	pop	ds
 36668                                  
 36669                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36670                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36671                                  ;
 36672                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36673                                  ;;else
 36674                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36675                                  ;;endif
 36676                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36677 00002FF7 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36678                                  
 36679                                  convloop:
 36680 00002FF9 AC                      	lodsb
 36681 00002FFA 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36682 00002FFC 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36683 00002FFE 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36684 00003000 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36685 00003002 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36686 00003004 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36687                                  noconv:
 36688                                  
 36689                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36690                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36691                                  ;;
 36692                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36693                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36694                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36695                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36696                                  ;;
 36697                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36698                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36699                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36700                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36701                                  ;check_eol:
 36702                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36703                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36704                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36705                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36706                                  ;;endif
 36707                                  	
 36708                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36709 00003007 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36710                                  convdone:
 36711 00003009 1F                      	pop	ds
 36712 0000300A 5E                      	pop	si
 36713 0000300B 59                      	pop	cx
 36714 0000300C C3                      	retn

 36717                                  ;
 36718                                  ; procedure : round
 36719                                  ;
 36720                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36721                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36722                                  ;
 36723                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36724                                  
 36725                                  round:
 36726                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36727 0000300D 1E                      	push	ds
 36728 0000300E 0E                      	push	cs
 36729 0000300F 1F                      	pop	ds
 36730                                  
 36731 00003010 50                      	push	ax
 36732                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36733 00003011 A1[DE03]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 36734                                  
 36735 00003014 E883E0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36736                                  
 36737                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36738 00003017 0106[E003]              	add	[memhi],ax
 36739                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36740 0000301B C706[DE03]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 36741                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36742 00003021 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 36743                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36744 00003024 3B06[A302]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 36745                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 36746                                  	; 17/09/2023
 36747 00003028 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs
 36748                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36749 0000302A F606[0614]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36750 0000302F 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36751 00003031 06                      	push	es
 36752 00003032 56                      	push	si
 36753                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36754 00003033 8B36[0414]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 36755 00003037 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36756 00003039 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36757 0000303B 48                      	dec	ax
 36758                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36759 0000303C 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36760                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36761 00003040 8026[0614]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36762 00003045 5E                      	pop	si
 36763 00003046 07                      	pop	es
 36764                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36765 00003047 58                      	pop	ax
 36766                                  
 36767                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36768 00003048 1F                      	pop	ds
 36769                                  
 36770                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36771                                  	; cf = 0
 36772                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36773                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36774 00003049 C3                      	retn

 36832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36833                                  ;
 36834                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36835                                  ;
 36836                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36837                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36838                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36839                                  ;
 36840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36841                                  
 36842                                  getnum:
 36843 00003080 53                      	push	bx
 36844 00003081 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36845                                  b2:
 36846 00003083 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36847 00003086 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36848                                  
 36849 00003088 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36850 00003089 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36851                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36852                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36853 0000308A B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36854 0000308C F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36855 0000308E 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36856 0000308F 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36857 00003091 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36858 00003094 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36859                                  
 36860 00003096 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36861                                  
 36862 00003097 E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36863 0000309A 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36864 0000309C 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36865 0000309E 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36866 000030A0 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36867 000030A2 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36868 000030A4 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36869 000030A6 7417                    	je	short b15
 36870 000030A8 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36871 000030AD 7410                    	je	short b15
 36872 000030AF 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36873                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36874                                  	;nop
 36875                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36876                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36877                                  	;nop
 36878                                  	;nop
 36879 000030B1 740C                    	je	short b15
 36880 000030B3 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36881 000030B5 7408                    	je	short b15
 36882 000030B7 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36883 000030B9 7404                    	je	short b15
 36884 000030BB 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36885 000030BD 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36886                                  b15:
 36887 000030BF 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36888 000030C4 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36889                                  b1:
 36890 000030C9 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36891 000030CB 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36892 000030CD 5B                      	pop	bx
 36893 000030CE C3                      	retn
 36894                                  badnum:
 36895                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36896                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36897 000030CF 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36898                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36899 000030D1 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36900 000030D5 5B                      	pop	bx
 36901 000030D6 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36902 000030D7 C3                      	retn
 36903                                  
 36904                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36905                                  
 36906                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36907                                  
 36908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36909                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36910                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36911                                  ;	si = 0
 36912                                  ;	ax = country id
 36913                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36914                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36915                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36916                                  ;
 36917                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36918                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36919                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36920                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36921                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36922                                  
 36923                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36924                                  
 36925 000030D8 57                      	push	di
 36926 000030D9 50                      	push	ax
 36927 000030DA 52                      	push	dx
 36928                                  
 36929 000030DB 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36930 000030DD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36931 000030DF B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36932 000030E2 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36933 000030E5 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36934                                  
 36935 000030E7 06                      	push	es
 36936 000030E8 56                      	push	si
 36937                                  
 36938 000030E9 0E                      	push	cs
 36939 000030EA 07                      	pop	es
 36940

 37233                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37234                                  
 37235                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37236                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37237                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37238                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37239                                  ;
 37240                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37241                                  ;	 be moved.
 37242                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37243                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37244                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37245                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37246                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37247                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37249                                  
 37250 00003228 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37251 00003229 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37252 0000322C F9                      	stc
 37253 0000322D CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37254 0000322F 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37255 00003230 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37256                                  
 37257 00003232 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37258 00003234 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37259 00003236 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37260 00003238 F9                      	stc
 37261 00003239 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37262                                  ricb_exit:
 37263 0000323B C3                      	retn

 37270                                  
 37271                                  set_country_path:
 37272                                  
 37273                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37274                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37275                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37276                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37277                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37278                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37279                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37280                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37281                                  
 37282                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37283                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37284                                  
 37285                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37286                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37287                                  
 37288                                  	push	si
 37289                                  
 37290                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37291                                  	push	es
 37292                                  	pop	ds
 37293                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37294                                  
 37295                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37296                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37297                                  
 37298                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37299                                  	inc	si
 37300                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37301                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37302                                  
 37303                                  scp_default_drv:
 37304                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37305                                  	int	21h
 37306                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37307                                  
 37308                                  scp_setdrv:
 37309                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37310                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37311                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37312                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37313                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37314                                  
 37315                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37316                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37317                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37318                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37319                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37320                                  
 37321                                  scp_root_dir:
 37322                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37323                                  scp_path:
 37324                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37325                                  
 37326                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37327                                  scpath_exit:
 37328                                  
 37329                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37330                                  	push	es
 37331                                  	pop	ds
 37332                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37333                                  
 37334                                  	pop	si
 37335                                  	retn
 37336                                  
 37337                                  %endif
 37338

 37439                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 37440                                  
 37441                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37442                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 37443                                  open_dev:
 37444 00003288 E80500                  	call	open_file
 37445 0000328B 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 37446                                  
 37447                                  open_dev1:
 37448 0000328D BA[F032]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 37449                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37450                                  	;call	open_file
 37451                                  ;of_retn:
 37452                                  	;retn
 37453                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37454                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 37455                                  open_file:
 37456 00003290 B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 37457 00003292 F9                      	stc
 37458 00003293 CD21                    	int	21h
 37459                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 37460 00003295 C3                      	retn
 37461                                  
 37462                                  open_dev3:

 37468                                  	;xor	ax,ax

 37474

 37476 000032A0 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 37477
